sense.def:
Lay
je preteklik pri nekaterih pomenih glagola
to lie
.

To lay something somewhere
pomeni nekaj dati nekam, da tam ostane.

seg.quote: She laid the baby gently down on its bed.
She laid a hand on his shoulder.

sense.def:
To lay the table
pomeni razporediti nože, vilice, krožnike in druge predmete po mizi pred obedom.

seg.quote: I'm not laying a place at table for him.

sense.def:
To lay something
pomeni nekaj, na primer preprogo ali kabel, položiti na pod ali tla v pravilni položaj.

seg.quote: They're laying water pipes and electricity cables.

sense.def:
Kadar samica ptice ali druge živali
lays an egg
, jajce pride iz njenega telesa.

To lay a trap
pomeni skriti past in jo namestiti tako, da bi se vanjo ujela kakšna žival.

To lay a trap
pomeni tudi nekoga ogoljufati, da bi ga ujeli ali prisilili, da bi naredil tisto, kar želimo.

seg.quote: He walked right into the trap I had laid for him.

sense.def:
To lay the basis for something
pomeni pripraviti vse, da bi se nekaj res zgodilo tako, kot želimo.

seg.quote: Her new policy helped to lay the foundations of electoral success.

sense.def:
To lay something on someone
pomeni povzročiti, da nekaj vpliva na nekoga.

seg.quote: Women lay most of the blame on men.
A curse has been laid on those who violated the tomb of the King.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
lay
opišemo osebe, ki imajo opraviti s krščansko Cerkvijo, vendar niso člani duhovščine, menihi ali nune.

Z izrazom
lay
opišemo tudi osebo, ki ni izučena ali usposobljena za določeno dejavnost ali témo.

seg.quote: The computer has become much more accessible to the lay person.

sense.def:
To lay someone open to criticism or attack
pomeni storiti nekaj, zaradi česar bodo ljudje nekoga kritizirali ali napadali.

seg.quote: That kind of behaviour can lay you open to the charge of wasting the company's time.

sense.def:
To lay emphasis on something
pomeni nekaj poudariti.

Če pravila ali vplivne osebe
lay down what people must do
, ljudem določijo, kaj morajo storiti.

seg.quote: ...the conditions laid down by the Department of Health.

sense.def:
To lay down one's life
pomeni biti ubit med bojem v vojni ali bitki;

To lay into someone
pomeni začeti nekoga napadati ali ga ostro kritizirati.

Kadar delavci
are laid off by their employers
, jim delodajalci ukažejo, naj zapustijo delo, navadno zato, ker ga zanje ni več.

To tell someone to lay off
pomeni nekomu reči, naj drugega pusti pri miru;

To lay on food, entertainment, or a service
pomeni priskrbeti hrano, zabavo ali uslugo.

seg.quote: We laid on a great show for them.

sense.def:
To lay out a group of things
pomeni razmestiti in urediti skupino stvari.

seg.quote: Clothes, jewels, and ornaments were laid out on the ground.

sense.def:
Kadar hočemo povedati, kako vrt, stavba ali mesto
is laid out
, povemo, kako je zasnovan.

seg.quote: Their settlement is laid out traditionally as a small village.
